title: Warranty on Google Pixel 4XL without receipt
content:
I received a Pixel 4 XL as a gift.
The phone is working fine but just wanted to know if I am covered until Google warranty without receipt since it was a gift?
Is the warranty attached to the phone IMEI or do I need to provide proof of purchase (which I don't have).

I was told that Pixel warranty is attached to the purchaser's google account and no one else can claim it with the original purchaser's email, name, address..etc. 

Can someone clarify that?
